summary.para: Notifies the implementer that the view's item enumeration has completed. This callback interface is provided to the view via

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods that enable the view to notify the implementer when the enumeration has completed. The view calls this method to tell the implementer that the enumeration can be retrieved via . The callback allows the implementer to share the views enumeration.
